alert: Expect mostly sunny weather on December 18 and 19 with highs of 17.3°C and 19.5°C respectively, but a chance of light rain is forecasted from December 20 onwards, with the highest precipitation chance of 63% on December 21. A significant drop in temperature is expected on December 23, with a low of 7.6°C, and windy conditions with gusts of up to 34.2 km/h. Towards the end of the week, mostly sunny weather is expected to return, with highs ranging from 16.3°C to 16.4°C on December 23 and 24, and a decrease in precipitation chances.
